section.title: Disable Prelinking
section.para:
This module disables prelinking by modifying the /etc/sysconfig/prelink to prevent the operating system from periodically prelinking system binaries, in addition to calling /usr/sbin/prelink -ua to revert any prelinking that had been done. When an undo is performed, /etc/sysconfig/prelink is restored, and the next time the /etc/cron.daily/prelink job is run, all prelinks will be recalculated.
